Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047 (MIC≤100 µM), Escherichia coli ATCC3 5218 (MIC≤100 µM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against a wide spectrum of Gram-positive bacteria. Lacks antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacteria E. cloacae and E. coli.
